question: What is the fee structure for B.Tech courses?
answer: The annual fee for B.Tech courses is ₹85,000 which includes tuition fee, development fee, and exam fees. Hostel and mess charges are additional.

question: What is the last date for admission?
answer: The last date for first-year admission is typically August 31st. For lateral entry, the deadline is September 15th. Please check the official notice for exact dates.

question: How can I apply for a scholarship?
answer: You can apply for scholarships through the State Scholarship Portal (ssp.rajasthan.gov.in). Required documents include income certificate, caste certificate (if applicable), and previous year marksheet.

question: What are the hostel facilities?
answer: The college has separate hostels for boys and girls with Wi-Fi, 24/7 water supply, mess facility, common room with TV, reading room, and sports facilities. Hostel fee is ₹35,000 per year.

question: When will the exam results be announced?
answer: Results are typically announced within 45 days after the examination. Results are published on the RTU website (rtu.ac.in) and the college notice board.

question: What documents are required for admission?
answer: Required: 10th/12th marksheets, JEE scorecard, Allotment letter, Transfer certificate, Migration certificate, Character certificate, Category certificate (if applicable), 6 passport photos, Aadhar card.

question: What are the library timings?
answer: The library is open 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM on working days. During exams, extended to 10:00 PM. Digital library is accessible 24/7 with student login.

question: How can I pay my fees?
answer: Fees can be paid via: 1) Online on college portal, 2) NEFT/RTGS transfer, 3) Demand draft, 4) Cash at fee counter (below ₹50,000). Online payment recommended.

question: फीस कितनी है?
answer: B.Tech कोर्स के लिए वार्षिक फीस ₹85,000 है जिसमें ट्यूशन फीस, डेवलपमेंट फीस और परीक्षा फीस शामिल है। हॉस्टल और मेस का खर्च अलग है।

question: छात्रवृत्ति के लिए कैसे आवेदन करें?
answer: छात्रवृत्ति के लिए राज्य छात्रवृत्ति पोर्टल (ssp.rajasthan.gov.in) पर आवेदन करें। आवश्यक दस्तावेज: आय प्रमाण पत्र, जाति प्रमाण पत्र (यदि लागू हो), और पिछले वर्ष की मार्कशीट।
